edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.particleFilter
Interface Updater<P extends Particle>

All Known Implementing Classes:
DeadReckoningGaussianUpdater, LogPlaybackDeadReckoningGaussianUpdater, NullUpdater
public interface Updater<P extends Particle>

Evolves the model of the world forward in time in the absence of new observations

Method Summary
 List<P> update(List<P> state)
          For each particle, evolve its state by sampling from the distribution of new states
 

Method Detail

update

List<P> update(List<P> state)
For each particle, evolve its state by sampling from the distribution of new states

Parameters:
state - The current list of particles. The contents of the list may be modified by update().
Returns:
A list of particles with updated values. May be the same object as the input (or a different one)
